headline: Lennar (LEN): Breaking Down Valuation After Analyst Concerns on Earnings Outweigh Expansion News
summary: If you're holding shares in Lennar, or considering jumping in, the past week has given you quite a bit to think about. Lennar (LEN) just dropped 3.5% in a single session, bucking the trend as the broader market moved higher. The trigger? Investors seem focused less on the company’s latest community launches and more on analyst expectations for a significant earnings drop in the upcoming Q3 report. This has nudged sentiment lower and renews questions about Lennar’s premium price tag compared...
